frontmatter.title: Page Content
frontmatter.intro: The page content section contains components which are used in-page to display information in comparison to normal body text. As price box, value box and callout all are various ways of highlighting information you should avoid mixing them in one view.
frontmatter.contentBelow: Note that several of the components in this section actually are set ways of combining other components, and perhaps wouldn’t be considered components if created today. For legacy reasons they are kept as components though.

frontmatter.title: Alert
frontmatter.description: Alerts are used to provide (contextual) messages for typical user actions and for important communication from Länsförsäkringar of a non-commercial nature.

frontmatter.title: Avatar
frontmatter.description: Avatars are used to give a visual representations of the various parties involved in a conversation.

frontmatter.title: Bar charts
frontmatter.description: Bar charts presents data in proportion to the values they represent. You can compare either various data sources for the same time period or the same data source over several different time spans. A typical use case at Länsförsäkringar is to compare the development of a fund or stock between various years.

frontmatter.title: Brand
frontmatter.description:
Länsförsäkringar är ett av Sveriges mest kända varumärken. Vår symbol ritades 1969 av den grafiska formgivaren Hans Hug och är idag en av Sveriges mest kända företagssymboler. 
Det är något vi värnar om tillsammans.

frontmatter.title: Breadcrumbs
frontmatter.description: Breadcrumbs lets the user get a sense of where they are in your application and offers a way back up in the site tree.

frontmatter.title: Buttons
frontmatter.description: Buttons are used as a part of a flow, and is the component which the user clicks to make progress in said flow.

frontmatter.title: Callout
frontmatter.description: The callout is used to highlight information which we want the user to notice in relation to a chunk of text.

frontmatter.title: Card
frontmatter.description: The card component is used to inform users about related products or content.

frontmatter.title: Checkbox
frontmatter.description: Your standard web component dressed in a Länsförsäkringar styling.

frontmatter.title: Collapse
frontmatter.description: Lets the user expand the current page and displays examples or a longer explanation which support the user in performing their task. This is the most common way of showing Read more in relation to forms.

frontmatter.title: Datepicker
frontmatter.description: The datepicker is the input field used when a date is the expected input.

frontmatter.title: Design hörnstenar
frontmatter.description: För att efterlikna det personliga mötet ska vi använda oss av våra hörnstenar. Expertis, labba och kontroll.

frontmatter.title: Designer
frontmatter.description: Som Designer i Länsförsäkringsgruppen finns det lite delar som du behöver veta innan du börjar designa. Vi går igenom allt här.

frontmatter.title: Distribution bar
frontmatter.description: The distribution bar gives the user an overview of the relative size of different values in relation to each other, like the different funds in your ISK.

frontmatter.title: Donut Chart
frontmatter.description: Donut charts are best to use when you are trying to compare parts of a whole. They do not show changes over time.

frontmatter.title: Dropdown
frontmatter.description: The dropdown provides the user with given options in a list which expands over the webpage when the user clicks on the container.

frontmatter.title: Graphic objects
frontmatter.description:
With graphic objects we can communicate more complex messages.
The graphic objects relates to our illustration but are often one single object. We can explain events, products, situations and environments.

frontmatter.title: Graphs and when to use them
Headings
frontmatter.description: We have two types of headlines - normal headings and hero display headings.

frontmatter.title: Icons
frontmatter.description:
We want our icons to be informative and easy to understand.
The icons are less abstract and more specific then the graphic objects. They should support the textual information or cluster information.
The icons come in various sizes, Each size with variations of details.

frontmatter.title: Illustration
frontmatter.description:
With illustrations we can communicate our brand idea. We are local.
We can illustrate geographic differences between our Länsbolag. We can also communicate different branches within Länsförsäkringar in a playful way. Often used as decoration.

frontmatter.title: Input field
frontmatter.description: Input fields are fields in which the user can enter text of some type (be it letters or numbers).

frontmatter.title: Lead paragraph
frontmatter.description: The lead paragraph is placed first on a page and is used to summarise the contents of a page.

frontmatter.title: Line chart
frontmatter.description: Line charts are used to display changes over a period of time. Line charts can also be used to compare changes over the same period of time for different data sets.

frontmatter.title: Line element
frontmatter.description: The line element is used to separate parts of the page from each other.

frontmatter.title: Links
frontmatter.description: Links are used when we want to guide the user away from the current page, as we expect them to want information which isn't part of the current flow.

frontmatter.title: Lists
frontmatter.description: Use to list small texts in dots or in numerical order and break up large blocks of text and make important info stand out.

frontmatter.title: Map Chart
frontmatter.description: Use a map if you have data with a geographical component. The typical use case is to show where in the world investments are placed.

frontmatter.title: Modal
frontmatter.description: Modals are triggered by the user clicking a button. They have two use cases; in a “Read more”-context and signing stuff.

frontmatter.title: Navbar
frontmatter.description: The navbar is the foundation for the various menus used at Länsförsäkringar.

frontmatter.title: Pagination
frontmatter.description: Use pagination to let the user where they are in a flow consisting of several pages.

frontmatter.title: Panel
frontmatter.description: Panels are our standard containers when we want to “box in” content. When panels are used the whole page is usually divided into different panels.

frontmatter.title: Paragraph
frontmatter.description: Brödtexten används på alla ställen där man inte vill ha en rubrik eller fet text.

frontmatter.title: Popover Tooltip
frontmatter.description: Used primarily as an explanation of terms and difficult words in inline text. When the user clicks/hovers a word with a popover tooltip a small popover appears in which explanatory text is displayed.

frontmatter.title: Price Box
frontmatter.description: The Price-box component displays the price/cost in a sidebar (desktop)/at the bottom of the screen (mobile) in flows where the user can purchase/sign-up for something. The price is updated as the user makes various choices in the main flow.

frontmatter.title: Progress bar
frontmatter.description: The progress bar helps the user in understanding how much of a flow has been completed if there is much to do in the flow.

frontmatter.title: Radio buttons
frontmatter.description: There are three types of radio buttons in LFUI; standard radio buttons, button groups and radio cards.

frontmatter.title: Shortcuts
frontmatter.description: The shortcut is preferably used at the top of a page to draw the users attention to another page or section.

frontmatter.title: Slider
frontmatter.description: A slider provides a visual way of providing a value.

frontmatter.title: Spinner
frontmatter.description: The spinner is used to show that the system is loading/fetching data and that the response isn't instantaneous.

frontmatter.title: Tables
frontmatter.description: Tables are used to display data. The data can be either of an informative nature or comparative.

frontmatter.title: Tabs
frontmatter.description: Tabs are used as contextual navigation when the user has landed on a page which hasn't any submenues in the main navigation.

frontmatter.title: Templates Lansforsakringar.se
frontmatter.description: Sidmallar för länsförsäkringar.se med syfte och information om varje sidtyp.

frontmatter.title: Timeline
frontmatter.description: The timeline component is an interactive way for the user to follow the progress of an (ongoing) errand, such as a damage claim or loan application.

frontmatter.title: Upload
frontmatter.description: Use this component if you want to let your user upload a file to us.

frontmatter.title: Value Box
frontmatter.description: The value box is intended to draw the users attention and for them to at-a-glance see the total value of the related content. It is primarily used in Mina sidor to display value of total/specific content.

frontmatter.title: Webbtillgänglighet förklaringar checklistan
frontmatter.description: Här går vi igenom punkt för punkt vad de betyder för Länsförsäkringar att följa checklistorna.

frontmatter.title: X-Y Plot
frontmatter.description: X-Y plots are used to determine relationships between the two different things.
